acceptOwnership().details: Only the pending owner can accept the ownership transfer

cancelEscrow(uint256).details: Can only be called by payer if product hasn't started shipping

constructor.details: Initializes the contract with ProductRegistry reference

createEscrow(uint256,address).details: Requires payment amount to be sent with transaction

params._payee: Address that will receive funds on delivery

returns.escrowId: Unique identifier for the created escrow

returns._0: Escrow struct containing all escrow data
Escrow ID (0 if no escrow exists)
Address of pending owner (address(0) if none)

raiseDispute(uint256,string).details: Can only be called during dispute period by payer or payee

releaseEscrow(uint256).details: Checks product status is Delivered or Verified, deducts platform fee

resolveDispute(uint256,bool).details: Owner acts as arbiter, can refund to payer or release to payee

params._refundToPayer: True to refund payer, false to pay payee

setPaused(bool).details: Emergency function to halt operations if needed

setPlatformFee(uint256).details: Only owner can update, max 10% (1000 basis points)

transferContractOwnership(address).details: Two-step process to prevent accidental transfers to wrong address

cancelEscrow(uint256).notice: Cancels an active escrow and refunds the payer

createEscrow(uint256,address).notice: Creates a new escrow for a product

getEscrowByProduct(uint256).notice: Gets escrow ID for a product

getEscrowCount().notice: Gets the total number of escrows created

getPlatformFee().notice: Gets the current platform fee percentage

isDisputePeriodActive(uint256).notice: Checks if dispute period is still active for an escrow

isPaused().notice: Checks if the contract is currently paused

raiseDispute(uint256,string).notice: Raises a dispute on an active escrow

releaseEscrow(uint256).notice: Releases escrow funds to payee upon delivery confirmation

transferContractOwnership(address).notice: Initiates ownership transfer to a new owner (step 1 of 2)
